amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for land acquisition for the Everglades National Park by $9 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to decrease the amount for National Park Service-Construction by $9,000,000 and to increase the amount for National Park Service-Land Acqusition and State Assistance by $9,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
